title: oLi kATTiDum
sahitya:
oLi kATTiDum paramA unai nambinEn un kazhal sharaN enru vandaDaindOrkenrum


anupallavi

  kaLI kUTTiDum rAmA (inbak) kannal nAmam uraippavar kaDaittEra


caraNam    iruL OTTiDum manappaghai vATTiDum abhaya karam nITTiDum paravasha nilai mUTTiDum bhaktar
 uravUTTiDum avar kazhal shiram shUTTiDum agahttinuL uru nATTiDum perudarkkariya pErinba vIDaDaya
